Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive/Orchard Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Wakeforest Drive and Orchard Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Orchard Lane runs east and west out of the intersection with Wakeforest Drive, which continues to the north and south. On the southeast, you can see the mysterious Dragon's Citadel. On the north side of the intersection, you can see a number of administrative buildings, primarily guard patrol buildings and barracks.
